title: Whiskey PuP: Reverse Trick
description: Whisky the Cattle Dog performs her Reverse Trick.

comments.name: Gary Wong
comments.comment: Believe me when I say that all these dogs want to do is work and please it's owners. They are too smart for their own good and are extremely neurotic! Best dogs on the entire face of the planet!!

comments.name: Micheal Lyons
comments.comment: The only thing that keeps me from getting a cattle dog is that I cant stand losing at chess.

title: Traveling Northern Norway
description: If there is one place on earth where it doesn’t matter if it rains, if snows, or if the sun shines because it’s beautiful never the less - it must be Lofoten Islands in Norway. A rugged mountain chain is rising up from the Gulf Stream, forming a rare and unique world. It’s wild and beautiful, with azure blue water, white beaches, green mountainsides, beautiful fjords, old fishing towns and maybe some of the most spectacular roads in the world.

comments.name: Micheal Lyons
comments.comment: Such a beautiful place. Absolutely stunning on a big screen and totally relaxing.

comments.name: Theodore Duncan
comments.comment: Such a beautiful place and music!  I feel like I can’t live on without it...thanks a lot for posting! Love!

title: Perseid Meteor Shower 2020
description: It’s an annual meteor shower that’s easily the most popular, though not quite the most prolific. It’s popular largely because it’s easily visible to the entire northern hemisphere in August, the most peak month for camping trips. It’s a chance to see as many as 100—but more likely about 50—“shooting stars” in the night sky around midnight.

comments.name: Micheal Lyons
comments.comment: The Universe is so beautiful and dangerous...Says Einstein

comments.name: Gary Wong
comments.comment: I saw it myself yesterday! In blink of eye it was gone! How wonderful it is to see something like this. Our world is so beautiful

comments.name: Theodore Duncan
comments.comment: I saw a meteoroid yesterday, it was so beautiful and near to our planet. I was captivated by that miracle of nature.

title: Argyle the Fox
description: Argyle the fox is my newest friend.  He came to visit me the other day on my driveway and we decided to play fetch with my dog's toy.  Needless to say, that toy is now gone!

comments.name: Candace Jones
comments.comment: Foxes have been known to dive headfirst into snow, jumping up in the air and burying themselves with their back end sticking out, to catch rodents underneath the snow. They usually come up empty, unless they're facing north. Scientists think they're using the magnetic field of the Earth to plot their trajectory.

comments.name: Gary Wong
comments.comment: As the Native American proverb says, 'Every animal knows something you don't.' This fox is on a whole nother level of chill that i will never understand.

title: Whisky Herding
description: Whisky's first attempt at herding sheep.  What a great job she did.  Look at those listening skills at the end!

comments.name: Theodore Duncan
comments.comment: My Border Collie herds my cats, which goes about as well as you’d expect.

comments.name: Gary Wong
comments.comment: I love watching dogs and their owners work together, it makes my heart smile. :)

comments.name: Candace Jones
comments.comment: Dogs are meant to have jobs, that's why those dogs looked so happy to work.

title: Choose the Perfect Northern Lights Getaway
description: Worried about finding the perfect travel accommodations? There are many things to consider when booking an accommodation. Consider picking the right location. Location is an important consideration for an enjoyable stay. Check the rating and price. Consider apartment or condo rentals. Weigh the food options. Is it family-friendly? Watch for extra fees. Assess the on-site amenities.

comments.name: Theodore Duncan
comments.comment: Probably a good thing I don't live in Alaska. I'd never get any sleep at all because I'd be up all night watching these beautiful lights.

comments.name: Candace Jones
comments.comment: I will definitely be planning a Northern Lights Getaway.  My dream is to see this in real life!

title: Plan2Train
description: Plan2Train is an organizational app focused on helping small businesses in the personal training and consulting space.  Trainers can upload and manage their resources, client information and lesson plans all in one place and easily share information with their clients.  Plan2Train is built using a 3 tier MERN stack architecture and employs Passport for authentication, heroku for deployment, Firebase for storage, the Google Maps API, SASS and Mongoose.

comments.name: Micheal Lyons
comments.comment: Wow!  This looks great.  As a physiotherapist I could really see this being useful to keep track of my clients and their progress.

comments.name: Gary Wong
comments.comment: What every personal trainer has been waiting for!

title: Beautiful Glass Blowing
description: Watch artisans expertly fashion beautiful glass by hand.  Glass blowing is truly mesmerizing to watch - the hot glass is like treacle - one false move and you have to start over.

comments.name: Gary Wong
comments.comment: Wow!!  The final glass is absolutely amazing!   Beautiful piece.

title: Profile Video
description: Introduction video created for a web developer profile site (www.pattiperlock.com).  Video created using Adobe After Effects.

comments.name: Candace Jones
comments.comment: Great Job Michael.  I love the sun coming over the mountains.
